description:
This content requires "Shadowverse: Champion's Battle" and cannot be used with the demo version.

A Premium Pass that comes with the points needed to reach level 10 in the indicated season. Purchasing this content will add premium rewards to each level of the Battle Pass. Leader skin Premium Pass rewards are also sold separately.

Leader skin rewards:
-Level 3: "Mysterious Girl"
-Level 15: "Mimori: Sublime Melody"
-Level 30: "Hiro: Awoken Flame"

Other rewards:
-Leader Skins
-Emblems
-Card Sleeves
-Flairs
-Umbra Coins
-Card Packs
-Mythical Cards (Random)
-Rupies

Notice
-Be careful not to purchase the same content twice. This Premium Pass contains the following items that are also available separately: "Leader Skin 'Hiro: Awoken Flame'", "Leader Skin: 'Mimori: Sublime Melody'", "Leader Skin 'Mysterious Girl'".
name: Season 1 Premium Pass + 10 Levels
